item.name: Activate Tenant - Step 1 - Get Org Identifier
Activate Tenant - Step 0 - Create Tenant Admin role

body.raw:
{
"name": "VCD Tenant Admin",
"description": "VCD Tenant Admin Role for vRealize Operations - Tenant App for vCloud Director Tenant Users (Multi Tenant)",
"system-created": false,
"privilege-keys": [
    "administration.api.read_access",
    "administration.api.metering_policy_view",
    "administration.accesscontrol.viewpage",
    "vCloud Tenant-vCloud-vCloud World",
    "content.alertdefinition.read",
    "content.symptomdefinition.read",
    "content.recommendation.view",
    "content.notification.read"
]
}

request.description: Only needed once: Create a Tenant Admin Role in vROPS, that's then being used for the individual tenant admin users
Create a new user that represents the Org, with a random password (vROPS Password complexity rules apply)
